title: Can Nami go mid? (Also, what other supports can?)
body:
No I'm not trolling, idk the champ well so I'm genuinely asking.
I like a lot of support champs, but don't like playing support. I mainly Mid or ADC.......so I was wondering if Nami was one of the supports that can go mid or nah?


Also, what other supports outside of Morgana or Zyra can go mid?
Could Soraka do it? And if not, then why not?


Thanks for any info! :D
